titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Public Administration Reports and Studies (Assorted), 1910-1992 AIS.1996.16
titlestmt.author: Maureen Jones.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-06-11 10:05:36 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Public Administration Reports and Studies (Assorted)

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Pittsburgh. Graduate School of Public and International Affairs

did.abstract: The collection contains both published and unpublished reports and studies of public projects and agencies that focus primarily on Pittsburgh and Allegheny County. Although limited, the collection also includes reports and studies on the city and county of Philadelphia, other areas in Pennsylvania, and some for other states and countries. Of particular note are the numerous annual reports and studies produced by departments and authorities within Pittsburgh and Allegheny County. Digital reproductions of selected reports are available online.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transfer from the University of Pittsburgh's Graduate School of Public and International Affairs Library (GISPIA) on June 6, 1996.

relatedmaterial.p: Allegheny Conference on Community Development Collection, 1944-1993, AIS.1973.04, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

Housing Authority of the City of Pittsburgh Records, 1937-1953, AIS.1966.08, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Public Administration Reports and Studies (Assorted), 1910-1992, AIS.1996.16, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series I: Reports on Allegheny County
Series II: Reports on Philadelphia (city and county)
Series V: Reports on Turtle Creek Valley (borough and region)
Series VI: Reports on Municipal Governments in Pennsylvania
Series VII: Reports by the University of Pittsburgh
Series VIII: Reports from other States
Series IX: Reports from Foreign Nations
Series X: Reports on Various Topics

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: Digital reproductions of selected reports will soon be available online.

bioghist.head: Biography/History
bioghist.p: The collection of assorted Public Administration Reports and Studies originated in the Library of the Graduate School of Public and International Affairs and consists primarily of reports produced for public administration projects and governance. Included are a myriad of redevelopment project planning reports, reports produced by state and local governments, and reports produced by researchers and center's at the University of Pittsburgh. The subjects of the reports and studies include: children's and youth services, employment, environmental impact, health care, education, housing, infrastructure, manufacturing and industry, parks and recreation, public safety, taxation, transportation, utilities, and more.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Maureen Jones in December 2015.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: Public Administration Reports and Studies (Assorted), 1910-1992, AIS.1996.16, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh
This collection was previously known as "The Glidden Collection." Glidden Classification is a Library of Congress system for cataloging "Public Administration" reports and documents.
